raw_body: WATSON – PATRICIA INDRAWANTHI (nee NEVINS SELVADURAI). Much loved wife of late Prince V.C. Watson,​ cherished mother of Saty,​ Suven,​ Yami and Anjali,​ loving mother-in-law of Nicola,​ Jayantha,​ Dinesh and Andrew; blessed grandmother of Tahlia,​ Shan,​ Ayla and Amara; beloved daughter of the late Dr. D.D.N. & late Viola Nevins Selvadurai; dearest sister/​sister-in-law of Anton & late Mercy & late Leila,​ Letty & late Vernon,​ Felicia & late Reggie,​ Timothy & Indranee,​ DDN & Christine,​ Stephen & Gnana,​ Paul & Debbie and Rohini & Luke; much loved cousin and Aunt of a large extended family across the globe. She passed away peacefully at home. Funeral at A.F. Raymond Parlour,​ Borella,​ 13th October 2023 opening from 11.30 a.m. Service at 3.15 p.m. Cremation at 5 p.m. Old Crematorium Borella,​ Kanatta.064911
